name: Datasets for Cyber Forensics - Frank Breitinger
description: Collection of datasets for researchers in the field of cyber forensics. Includes types such as Android Application Packets (APK), Apple iPod Disk Images, Different Types of Files, and more, with metadata on origin, source, and date. The datasets are not consistently described, but most are accompanied by descriptions and metadata.
geotopics: data not applicable or not geospatial
